title: Study on the adsorption performance of modified high silica fly ash for methylene blue
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21342-21354
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04017A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xuying Guo, Zilong Zhao, Xinle Gao, Yanrong Dong, Honglei Fu, Xiaoyue Zhang
Based on the high silica content and adsorption characteristics of fly ash, two novel adsorbents, namely mesoporous silica-based material (MSM) and sodium dodecyl sulfate-modified fly ash (SDS-FA), were prepared.
